title: United States Post Office (Albion, Nebraska)
text:
The Albion United States Post Office, also known as U.S. Post Office-Albion in <a href="Albion%2C%20Nebraska">Albion</a> in <a href="Boone%20County%2C%20Nebraska">Boone County, Nebraska</a>, was built in 1939. It was listed on the <a href="National%20Register%20of%20Historic%20Places">National Register of Historic Places</a> in 1992.
This is one of 12 Nebraska post offices featuring a <a href="Section%20of%20Fine%20Arts">Section of Fine Arts</a> mural, "Nebraska in Winter" (1939) by Jenne Magafan.
It is a one-story brick building with simple <a href="Colonial%20Revival%20architecture">Colonial Revival</a> details.
